message.content:
cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.FL, cs.SC 

The paper describes an algorithm for proving termination of programs using systems of monotonicity constraints in the integer domain. This falls under the category of logic in computer science (cs.LO). Additionally, the paper discusses the application of the approach as the back-end for the termination analysis of Java Bytecode (JBC), which falls under programming languages (cs.PL) and software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also mentions the use of two different termination analyzers, AProVE and COSTA, which are tools for formal verification and automated reasoning, respectively, and thus could fall under formal languages and automata theory (cs.FL) and symbolic computation (cs.SC).
